name: "After-Class Practice"
effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.
description: Jahoda's specialty. After seeking advice on baking techniques from Ineffa for the sixth time, Jahoda finally presented her assignment â€” a handmade pastry. The shape is a bit wobbly, but the sweet scent of berries is irresistible, and the taste... well, it can't be too bad, right?
